home.hero_subtitle: Discover authentic handcrafted treasures from local artisans
home.newsletter_subtitle: Stay updated with new artisan collections and exclusive offers
home.artisan_cta_subtitle: Join our growing community of talented artisans! Showcase your crafts, reach thousands of customers, and grow your business with our comprehensive seller dashboard.
home.manage_products_desc: Easy-to-use tools to add, edit, and track your products
home.track_orders_desc: Monitor sales and manage customer orders efficiently
home.view_analytics_desc: Get insights on your sales performance and earnings

artisan.whats_happening: Here's what's happening with your artisan store today.

cart.title: Your Shopping Cart
cart.empty_message: Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet.

language_support.title: Language Support Demo
language_support.subtitle: Experience our marketplace in both English and Hindi. Switch between languages seamlessly and see how our platform adapts to your preferred language instantly.
language_support.ui_elements_desc: See how various interface elements adapt to different languages with proper typography and cultural context.
language_support.product_showcase_desc: Browse products with localized descriptions, pricing, and cultural relevance.
language_support.navigation_demo_desc: Explore how navigation and menu items translate naturally across languages.
language_support.demo_card_desc: This card demonstrates how content adapts based on the selected language.
language_support.translation_quality: High-quality translations preserve meaning and cultural context.
language_support.features_desc: Our commitment to accessibility ensures every artisan and customer can engage naturally in their preferred language.
language_support.realtime_switching_desc: Instantly switch between languages without page reloads or data loss.
language_support.local_community_desc: Connect with artisans and customers in your native language for authentic cultural exchange.
language_support.seamless_shopping_desc: Complete your entire shopping journey from browsing to checkout in your preferred language.
language_support.cultural_preservation_desc: Preserve and celebrate linguistic diversity while promoting traditional crafts.
language_support.testimonials_desc: Hear from artisans and customers about their experience using the platform in their native language.
language_support.cta_desc: Start your journey with our artisan marketplace and experience the power of native language support.
